forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Rain showers this morning, with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Windy this morning. High 51F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
